description: Kirino suddenly is really nice to Kyousuke, and then asks him to do a last "life counseling" for him, by buying an eroge for her when it`s on sale - at midnight in Akihabara. But the real problems for Kyousuke begin when Kirino asks him to play the game together.

titles.title: Les conseils pour ma petite soeur ne peuvent se finir ainsi
Ore no Imouto no Jinsei Soudan ga Kore de Owaru Wake ga Nai: Good End
There`s No Way My Little Sister`s Life Advice Can End Like This (Good End)
俺の妹の人生相談がこれで終わるわけがない GOOD END♡
